messages.subject: precocious kids
messages.msgSnippet: ... anyone ... All 4 of my kids loved books like that at a very young age as well as TV shows and videos like that. And they still do. They especially like the
messages.messageBody:
>"Beth Ali" <blali@...>


>My 3.5 yr old, Shawn, seems to be only really interested in factual books
>and videos. How "normal" is this? When we go to the library he picks books
>that are way advanced--which mom and dad have to read--like the Big Book of
>Bones, and Eyewitness book on Volcanoes and Earthquakes! The videos are the
>same thing..all about volcanoes, spaceships,animals, mummies, etc. etc. His
>interests seem oddly diverse for only having been around 3 yrs!!! Has
anyone
>else had a child this interested in the realities in the world at such a
>yound age??


All 4 of my kids loved books like that at a very young age as well as TV
shows and videos like that. And they still do. They especially like the
Eyewitness books. Our librarian at the air force base where we live, who is
a big supporter of homeschooling, knew of my kids love of Eyewitness books,
and when the library was given a grant she ordered an enormous set of them!
My kids went crazy checking them out.

Suzanna, who is rather fond of Eyewitness books herself.
